channel.title: Ranging Problem. (Mage Also) (Someone Post? Anything To Help?)
channel.description:
Yes, hmmm...I have a bug in my server. :) It's probably easy to fix but, well, my Range has the correct Projectiles and everything, but the only problem is with it is that when you Equip 1 Rune Arrow. You have an Infinite Amount. Is there any way to change/fix this problem? :)
(Same With Mage! [Except Runes!] )
~Scarr. :)
